item.title: Event Types
item.description: This page lists all event types that can be generated by Trustgrid nodes. Events are alphabetized and grouped by their filter type. For events that have both trigger and resolution states, the trigger severity and resolution severity are shown. Contents All Gateways Disconnected All Peers Disconnected BGP Peer Connectivity Certificate Expiring Cluster Failover Configuration Update Failure Connection Flapping Connection Timeout Data and Control Plane Disruption Data Plane Disruption Deregister DNS Resolution Gateway Connectivity Health Check Gateway Ingress Limit Reached Gateway UDP Tunnel Error Metric Threshold Violation Network Error Network Health Check Networking Framework Memory Management Node Connect/Disconnect Node Delete Node Stop Error Order Commented Order Created Repo Connectivity Site Outage SSH Lockdown Unauthorized IP Event Types All Gateways Disconnected Trigger Severity: WARNING
